definitions.body: cleft of a crag, cstr. [[סְעִיף סֶלַע]] Ju Jdg 15:8, Jdg 15:11; pl. cstr. [[וּבִסְעִפֵַי הַסְּלָעִים]] Is 2:21; ´[[סְעִיפֵי הַסּ]] Is 57:5.

branches, boughs, pl. cstr. [[סְעִפֵַי הַפּׂרִיׇּה]] Is 17:6 (so divide, Hi Kn Di Dr:Sm xxx Du al.) the boughs of the fruit-tree; sf. [[סְעִיפֶיהָ]] Is 27:10 (of ruined city; cf. [[קְחִירָהּ]] v:Is 27:11).
